api = [
`https://www.aaccnn.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"

`https://www.aahhss.com/e/search/,{

  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aakkrr.com/book/${key}<,/${page}>`,
toDataUrl(key,page-1)]
v = String(checkData()['api'])
result = api[v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:2]

ruleContent.title:
<js>
url=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")[0]
try{
	result=java.get(`${getSourceKey()}${url}`,source.getHeaderMap(false)).body()
	content=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select(".content");
	if (content==""){throw new Error(result)}
	createFile(content,url)
}catch(e){
	java.log(e)
	result=readFile(url)
}
</js>.content@p@textNodes##æ ‡é¢˜[:ï¼š](.*)\n##{{chapter.title}} $1###

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
booklist=[]
$=checkData()
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key,page,sortType]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word):/.test(key)){
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
		}else{
			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)
    booklist=booklist.filter(b=>String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
  
  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){
  st=sortType||$.sortType
  booklist.sort((a,b)=>getSortValue(a,st)-getSortValue(b,st))
  	}
  if(!$.order){
  	booklist.reverse()
  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\nâœ…æˆåŠŸè·å–${booklist.length}æœ¬ä¹¦ç±`)
  else if((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0)java.toast("\nâš ï¸è¯·å…ˆç™»å½•æ„é€ æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®")
  booklist=getl(booklist,page);
	}else {
		result=java.getElements(".book-like a")
		count=0
		result.forEach(r=>{
			id=java.getString("href",r).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
			temp={name:java.getString('h4@text',r),author:java.getString("span@text",r),cover:String(java.getString("img@src",r)).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,"")}
			if (!(id in $.books)){
				$.books[id]=Object.assign({},temp)
				count++
				}
			temp.id=id
			booklist.push(temp)
			})
		if (count>0){
			java.toast(`\nâœ…æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®æ–°å¢${count}æœ¬`)
			setv($)
			}
		}
JSON.stringify(booklist)
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\nâœ…æˆåŠŸè·å–${booklist.length}æœ¬ä¹¦ç±\nå½“å‰ä¸ºæŒ‰${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"è‚‰é‡":($.sortType=="score"?"è¯„åˆ†":($.sortType=="word"?"å­—æ•°":($.sortType=="update"?"æ›´æ–°":"ID")))}${$.order?"â¬†ï¸æ­£":"â¬‡ï¸å€’"}åºæ’åˆ—`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\nâæœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œè¯·åˆ‡æ¢æœç´¢æ¥å£")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>
ruleSearch.name: {{@h4@text||h3@text||""}}{{$.name||""}}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
id=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")[0]
if (Date.now() - book.lastCheckTime > 10000){
	java.log('æ›´æ–°ç›®å½•');
	java.refreshTocUrl();
}
result=readFile(`/book/${id}/index.html`)
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\nâœ…ç›®å½•ä¹±åºä¿®å¤å·²å¼€å¯")
	   chapterData=chapters.toArray().map((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/ç¬¬(\d+)(-\d+)?ç« /);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        item.id(chapterNumber)
        return item
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.id() - b.id());
} else {
    chapterData = chapters;
}
chapterData
</js>
